All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Attack
Model for attack as a Unit attribute
Attacking
Interface for species that can attack others
AttackType
 
BattleEngine
Supplementary Engine that manages attacks and defences
Battlefield
Singleton paradigm class containing tiles Map and their processing
BattlefieldPresenter
Interface to be implemented on Presenters
Container
Interface for Basic Tiles that are Containers for all other Tiles.
Damage
Data transfer object, lol
Damageable
Interface for classes that can be damaged
Destroyable
Interface for everything that can be destroyed.
DiceRoller
Supplementary class to roll specified set of dices
Dices
 
DiceSet
Wrapper class for Set
GameEngine
Game engine.
Hex
Class representing hex coordinate.
HexDelta
Class containing legal shortest hex vectors
HexMath
Utility class for Hex mathematics
MapInitializer
Interface for various Initializers
Movable
Basic interface for Units or whatever can move
MovementEngine
Supplementary Engine that manages Unit movements
Path
List of Hex delta vectors with additional methods and validators.
Plain
Placeholder class for empty Tiles
Player
Just a basic player class.
RectangleBattlefieldInitializer
 
Terrain
Basic abstract Terrain that can contain attached unit
Tile
Basic ABSTRACT class for all hex based entities like Units and Terrain, Strategic points.
Unit
